cost.description: The cost of the inventory item

requires_shipping.description: Flag indicating if the inventory item requires shipping

duplicate_sku_count.description: The number of inventory items that share the same SKU with this item

created_at.description: The date and time when the inventory item was created

tracked.description: Flag indicating if the inventory item is tracked

updated_at.description: The date and time when the inventory item was last updated

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the inventory item belongs

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the inventory item in the admin GraphQL API

province_code_of_origin.description: The province code indicating the origin of the inventory item

id.description: The unique identifier of the inventory item

country_code_of_origin.description: The country code indicating the origin of the inventory item

sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the inventory item

harmonized_system_code.description: The harmonized system code for the inventory item

country_harmonized_system_codes.description: The harmonized system codes associated with the inventory item
